About me

I am a member of the analysis subgroup in the pure math(s) research group in the University of Melbourne School of Mathematics and Statistics.

I got my PhD from Stanford in 2011, working with Rafe Mazzeo.

After that I was:

  • 2014– 2016 J.J. Sylverster Assistant Professor, postdoctoral researcher at Johns Hopkins University
  • 2012–2014 Postdoctoral researcher at the University of Toronto
  • 2011–2012 Postdoctoral researcher at the Australian National University

Contact information:

email: jgell `at’ unimelb.edu.au

phone: +61383443641

office: University of Melbourne, Parkville Campus, Peter Hall Building, Office 202

This is Jesse Gell-Redman's website! It has mostly my papers, professional info, and also some teaching resources. People interested in doing analysis at the University of Melbourne should look through the links above.
